title: SmartGold01
author: SmartGold01
content: For days now I have been having issues to access bpip site I don't know if this is only happening from my ends or anyone else is experiencing this as well. I have tried to switch between my network to used another 5G device to have a smarter and smooth network operation but still can't access it. Did anyone else facing same challenges?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Same here having an issue accessing the site it only shows enter when I click enter it's slow before you access the main page but I can't scroll down and the text is black I can't barely see them.It seems it's under a DDOS attack check all replies from this page below.- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5213618.msg63331210#msg63331210

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on December 16, 2023, 12:12:34 AMIt seems it's under a DDOS attack check all replies from this page below.- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5213618.msg63331210#msg63331210Please use that thread to discuss this issue... yes, it's a DDOS attack, site is kinda sorta working right now but not sure how long. Someone is very determined to take it down so this nonsense might last a while until they get bored.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: Yeah the site is not working so as suggested @OP just lock this thread to avoid any off topic discussion when there is already the same thread.So no fun in discussion with same thing here as well.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: Quote from: suchmoon on December 16, 2023, 12:34:26 AMQuote from: BitMaxz on December 16, 2023, 12:12:34 AMIt seems it's under a DDOS attack check all replies from this page below.- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5213618.msg63331210#msg63331210Please use that thread to discuss this issue... yes, it's a DDOS attack, site is kinda sorta working right now but not sure how long. Someone is very determined to take it down so this nonsense might last a while until they get bored.Thank you for your suggestions, at least I have understood the main reason why I can't access the site so easily. Most times I do visit the site to view and track some records but of lately having kinda tough time to access it.Now I will have to lock this thread to continue with the above thread shared.
